data.eml:eml: Thesium nautimontanum, a new species of Thesiaceae (Santalales) from South Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Garcia, Miguel Angel, Nickrent, Daniel L., Mucina, Ladislav (2018): Thesium nautimontanum, a new species of Thesiaceae (Santalales) from South Africa. PhytoKeys 109: 41-51, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.109.28607, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.109.28607
